sentences: Tomomi Ogawa (小川 ともみ, Ogawa Tomomi, born 31 May 1990 in Hyōgo Prefecture), known for both her full name or by her stage name Tomomi, is a Japanese musician, singer and songwriter.

Ogawa was born in Hyōgo Prefecture and was enrolled at a talent school in Osaka named Caless Prior to her career as a musician, she appeared along with her future bandmate Mami Sasazaki and singer Yuya Matsushita in a TV commercial.

On March 11, 2014, Oricon and Fuji TV announced that Tomomi Ogawa will be the new bassist of the Domoto Brothers Band, the house band that plays for the Sunday night TV musical variety show Shin Domoto Kyodai (新堂本兄弟).
Her first TV appearance with the band was on April 6, 2014.
